4207.name: Unknown
4207.message:
An error has occurred.

Please try again later.

If you are using a Wi-Fi network,
the signal strength may be too poor.
Please move the console closer to the
network device, make sure that there
are no obstructions between the two,
and then try again.

If you are using a public Wi-Fi network,
delete the connection in the Internet
option in System Settings and choose
another connection.

If the problem persists, please
make a note of the error code and
visit support.nintendo.com.
